Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout
Added_Other.mechanism: Automatically logs out users from consoles when their account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by preventing unauthorized access.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a pop-up that alerts users when their account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Increases account security awareness by informing players about their account status.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables the use of biometric authentication methods like fingerprint or face recognition for security.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides players with a faster and more secure way to log in to their accounts.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit
Added_Other.mechanism: Imposes limits on how often players can participate in challenges.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents spamming and ensures fair play in challenge events.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows players to exit challenges without penalties.
Added_Other.purpose: Gives players the freedom to leave challenges if they choose.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances navigation by focusing on live user presence data.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by allowing players to see who is currently active and easily navigate to them.
